ch.epfl.lasec.universitycontest
Class UniversityContestProtocol

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lasec.universitycontest.UniversityContestProtocol

public class UniversityContestProtocol
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to handle the protocol for university protocol.

Author:
Sebastien Duc

askChallengeSolution

public static ChallengeScore askChallengeSolution(java.io.InputStream in,
                                                  java.io.OutputStream out,
                                                  java.lang.String challengeName)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
Used by the client to query the server for the solution of a specific (challengeName) challenge the client did. The client also receives the score he did in detail.

Parameters:
in -
out -
challengeName - Name of the challenge of which the client wants to see the solution
Returns:
the score and the solution the client did for the specific challenge
Throws:
java.io.IOException

teamAuthentication

public static boolean teamAuthentication(java.io.InputStream in,
                                         java.io.OutputStream out,
                                         int teamId,
                                         java.lang.String secret)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Used to ask authentication to the server. To achieve authentication, a challenge-response protocol is done.

Parameters:
in -
out -
teamId - ID of the team.
Returns:
true iff authentication succeeded
Throws:
java.io.IOException

handleTeamAuthentication

public static void handleTeamAuthentication(java.io.InputStream in,
                                            java.io.OutputStream out,
                                            boolean answer)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
To be called when the server has already handled the authentication of the client and determines whether it has succeeded. It allows the server to answer to the client to tell him if it has succeeded.

Parameters:
in -
out -
answer -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
